description: DND has a requirement for two (2) x B.13 Operations Support Specialist Level 3.
full_summary:
**TBIPS RFP W8474-24DB08**
================":[ Introduction ]
### Government of Canada - Tender Opportunity
The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of two (2) x B.13 Operations Support Specialist Level 3 resources to support the Directorate of Project Delivery Management Information Systems (DPDMIS) in managing National Institute of Science and Technology (NIST) Servers and Automated Biometric/Fingerprint Identification System (ABIS/AFIS) Server and Databases.

### Tender Overview
- **Amendment Number** : 6
- **Solicitation Number** : W8474-24DB08
- **Publication Date** : November 30, 2023
- **Closing Date** : December 15, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
- **Contact Information** :
  - Juan Saenz (juven@forces.gc.ca, (343) 596-7090)
  - Director of Electronic Systems Procurement 3, DND, 60 Moodie Dr., Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2

### Project Details
The selected bidder will be required to provide two (2) x B.13 Operations Support Specialist Level 3 resources to support the DPDMIS team in the
-   Coordination of engineering and integration activities
-   Management of NIST Servers and Automated Biometric/Fingerprint Identification System (ABIS/AFIS) Server and Databases

### Tenders Documents
Tenders documents can be downloaded from [Canada Buys Website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Key documents include:
*   **W8474-24DB08 TBIPS NPP (English)**: This document describes the new requirements for TBIPS NPP
*   **W8474-24DB08 TBIPS NPP (French)**: This document describes the new requirements for TBIPS NPP
*   **W8474-24DB08 QA**: This document contains the questions and answers for TBIPS RFP

### Eligibility Criteria
This tender is open to bidders who have the necessary expertise and resources to fulfill the requirements. Please review the procurement category and notice type for more information. Canada is following a traditional competitive tendering process.

### Note
Canada is conducting this project in compliance with law.  Bidders respond to this request in their private capacity and not as an employee or franchisee of the Government of
